product_name: Julbo Vermont Classic Glacier Glasses - Men's
long_description: The legend returns. The Julbo Vermont Classic glacier glasses are the signature Julbo mountaineering glasses, brought back to celebrate Julbo's 125th anniversary. These Julbo Vermont Classic glacier glasses give complete comfort and protection while heading for the summit. Spectron 4 polycarbonate lenses block 100% of UV rays and 95% of visible light creating a clear image. A flash treatment to lenses reinforces the filtering of visible light through a mirror finish. Moldable ear temples offer added security with a customized fit. Leather nose piece and vented leather side shields block peripheral light and can be removed as needed.
short_description: The legend returns. The Julbo Vermont Classic glacier glasses are the signature Julbo mountaineering glasses, brought back to celebrate Julbo's 125th anniversary.
